full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,RGYUD 'GREL LDE MIG CES BYA BA RDZOGS RIM KYI SDOMS TSIGS MDOR BSDUS BCAS BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @027A *, ,AOm SVA STI, RGYUD DANG RDZOGS RIM BLTA BA'I LDE MIG 'DI, ,BDE GSAL BKA' BCU BLO BZANG TSE RING GYIS, ,PAR DU BSKRUN PA'I DGE TSOGS BDUD RTZI'I MTHUS, ,SRID ZHI'I RGUD PA DRUNG NAS 'BYIN PAR SHOG ,STON PA MCHOG DES PHUN TSOGS 'KHOR DBUS SU, ,RGYUD 'DI BRIS 'DZIN KLOG SEMS 'DRIR BCUG SOGS, ,BYANG CHUB RDO RJE 'DRA BAR 'GYUR RO ZHES, ,GSUNGS PA'I BDEN 'BRAS DED 'DIR MNGON 'GYUR SHOG ,BDAG DANG 'GRO BA RNAM MKHA' MTHA' KHYAB KUN, ,^RDO RJE 'CHANG DNGOS BLA MAS MNYES BZHIN DU, ,RJES SU BZUNG NAS BKA' BZHIN SGRUB PA DANG, ,RIN CHEN LTA BU'I GDUL BYAR 'GYUR BAR SHOG ,CES PA'I DGE BSDO 'DI YANG KHRI THOG BDUN BCU PAS SBYAR BA'O,,
